<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs=""
>
[Unwind Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3653) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Clockwork Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=184)

**Prerequisites**
[Clockwork Reanimator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3645)

**Requirements**
The target's body must be mostly intact.

</column>

---

Combining necromancy with the mysterious temporal powers of clockwork, you wind a creature backward from the moment of its death. Attempt a DC 40 [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) check to revive a dead creature that has been dead for no more than 3 rounds. If you succeed, the target returns to life with the effects of [_raise dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=243), except it still has the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition it had before dying, increased by 1 (or wounded 1 if it wasn't wounded before dying). Whether you succeed or fail, the target is then temporarily immune to Unwind Death for 1 day.
name: Unwind Death
requirement: The target's body must be mostly intact.
